ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for heaven - We built it with great power and gave it its vast expanse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We built the heavens by Our authority; and We are the Lord of power and expanse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And heaven – We made it with Our Own Power and We have the Power to do so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have made the heavens with Our own hands and We expanded it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have built the heaven with hands (the Divine Power), and it is We Who give the expanse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: With Hands We constructed the heaven. Verily, We are able to expand the vastness of space thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the heaven, We raised it high with power, and most surely We are the makers of things ample.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And heaven -- We built it with might, and We extend it wide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We have built the heaven with might, and We it is Who make the vast extent (thereof).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We built the universe with Our might, giving it its vast expanse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the heaven! We have built it with might, and verily We are powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We have built the heaven with might, and indeed it is We who are its expanders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With power and skill did We construct the Firmament: for it is We Who create the vastness of pace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: With power did We construct the heaven. Verily, We are Able to extend the vastness of space thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We built the heaven with might, and We widely extended it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We constructed the universe with power, and We are expanding it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:47] And the heaven, We built it with might, and indeed We are powerful (one says āda’l-rajulu or ya’īdu, to mean, ‘he is strong’; and awsa‘a’l-rajulu, to mean, ‘he has become capable [dhū sa‘a] and strong’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We have built) created (the heaven with might, and We it is who make the vast extent (thereof)) as We will; it is also said that this means: we expand the provision thereof.
